attributes.action: Ban all Religious stalls/speakers from Birmingham City Centre
attributes.additional_details: PLEASE NOTE.... This petition is aimed at all Religious stalls/speakers.
attributes.background: I don't think its right that people visiting Birmingham City Centre should be approached or have to listen to people's Religious views, Birmingham is a multicultural City and has plenty of Churches, Mosques, Temples, etc, for those people wanting to know more about a certain Religion

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
